comments.content:
Detailed Report: https://oss-fuzz.com/testcase?key=5876247907926016

Project: glib
Fuzzing Engine: libFuzzer
Fuzz Target: fuzz_resolver
Job Type: libfuzzer_asan_glib
Platform Id: linux

Crash Type: Heap-buffer-overflow READ 12
Crash Address: 0x602000000dbb
Crash State:
  g_resolver_records_from_res_query
  fuzz_resolver.c
  
Sanitizer: address (ASAN)

Recommended Security Severity: Medium

Regressed: https://oss-fuzz.com/revisions?job=libfuzzer_asan_glib&range=202112160607:202112170603

Reproducer Testcase: https://oss-fuzz.com/download?testcase_id=5876247907926016

Issue filed automatically.

See https://gitlab.gnome.org/GNOME/glib/tree/master/fuzzing#how-to-reproduce-oss-fuzz-bugs-locally for instructions to reproduce this bug locally.
When you fix this bug, please
  * mention the fix revision(s).
  * state whether the bug was a short-lived regression or an old bug in any stable releases.
  * add any other useful information.
This information can help downstream consumers.

If you need to contact the OSS-Fuzz team with a question, concern, or any other feedback, please file an issue at https://github.com/google/oss-fuzz/issues. Comments on individual Monorail issues are not monitored.

This bug is subject to a 90 day disclosure deadline. If 90 days elapse
without an upstream patch, then the bug report will automatically
become visible to the public.

This bug is approaching its deadline for being fixed, and will be automatically derestricted within 7 days. If a fix is planned within 2 weeks after the deadline has passed, a grace extension can be granted.

- Your friendly Sheriffbot

This bug has exceeded our disclosure deadline. It has been opened to the public.

- Your friendly Sheriffbot

Fix available as https://gitlab.gnome.org/GNOME/glib/-/merge_requests/2566

I doubt that any of the fuzzing failures from gthreadedresolver.c will be remotely exploitable. The parsing code in gthreadedresolver.c is used to parse the records returned by libc’s res_nquery(), which presumably already does its own validation of anything coming from the network.

ClusterFuzz testcase 5876247907926016 is verified as fixed in https://oss-fuzz.com/revisions?job=libfuzzer_asan_glib&range=202203220603:202203230602

If this is incorrect, please file a bug on https://github.com/google/oss-fuzz/issues/new
